issue.title: [Rust] Labeler is not labeling
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10179](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10179). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The labeler is not doing its job and erroring. There is a bug on its declaration.
